post/2009/General Updates and NQP

date

2009-12-09

note/2009

I was laid off last week, which is no fun. On the other hand, it gives me a little time to work on the site. On the other other hand, I’m still doing a quick contract at Smith and Tinker so I don’t have a lot of time. Still, there was enough time to work together with Jonathan “Duke” Leto in creating a new Parrot Babystep. We’ll push it to the site next week, after a little polishing.

Meanwhile, here’s a quick blurb about post/2009/NQP - Not Quite Perl. It’s not much, but it does have an example. That sets it apart from most of my quick blurbs.
